code: import React,{lazy,useState}from"react";import sidebarItems from"./Sidebar";import{Content,Layout,Menu,Sider}from"../../../components";import{theme}from"antd";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Bulk=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import("./bulk"));const MobileForm=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import("./Create"));const PostingData=()=>{const[selectedMenuItem,setSelectedMenuItem]=useState("upload-single");const{token:{colorBgContainer}}=theme.useToken();const componentMap={"upload-single":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MobileForm,{submitMessage:"submit",formHeading:"Create Mobile",method:"POST",url:"http://localhost:4000/api/create",message1:"Mobile Created Successfully"}),"bulk-upload":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bulk,{})};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Layout,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Content,{style:{padding:"0 0"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Layout,{style:{padding:"24px 0",background:colorBgContainer},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sider,{style:{background:colorBgContainer},width:200,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{mode:"inline",style:{height:"100%"},items:sidebarItems,selectedKeys:selectedMenuItem,onClick:e=>setSelectedMenuItem(e.key)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Content,{style:{padding:"0 24px",minHeight:280},children:componentMap[selectedMenuItem]})]})})})});};export default PostingData;
